name: Kishugu Aviation (Pty) Ltd
about: Kishugu Aviation (Pty) Ltd, part of the Kishugu Group, is a renowned aviation training organisation based in South Africa. Our flight academy offers comprehensive training programs, including Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), Night Rating, Instrument Rating, and Multi Engine Rating. We provide both full-time and part-time study options to cater to various student needs. With a fleet of over 40 aircraft, Kishugu Aviation is also a leading provider of aerial firefighting, air cargo services, and aviation maintenance. Our training is conducted by highly skilled instructors, ensuring students receive top-quality education and practical experience. Kishugu Aviation is committed to producing well-rounded and competent pilots, ready to excel in the aviation industry.
